pr_title: [Improvement] Extending the expiry time of commonAuth Cookie

timeline.message: [Improvement] Extending the expiry time of commonAuth Cookie

timeline.author: janakamarasena

replies.bodyText:
We can move this to FrameworkConstants as well.
https://github.com/wso2/carbon-identity-framework/blob/master/components/authentication-framework/org.wso2.carbon.identity.application.authentication.framework/src/main/java/org/wso2/carbon/identity/application/authentication/framework/util/FrameworkConstants.java
replies.author: janakamarasena

timeline.bodyText:
From how much is the expiry time increased?
is it by SessionIdleTimeout?
timeline.author: janakamarasena

replies.bodyText: No. In the resident IDP config we specify the remember me timeout. So for each auth, this expiry time will be extended for that specified time.
replies.author: somindatommy
